name: Avoid empty catch statement (Flex)
description: This QR reports artifacts that have empty catch statement.
output:
This QR reports artifacts that have empty catch statement. It provides following information:

- Artifact full name
rationale: Catch blocks should have code to handle the thrown exception. If they are empty or have only comments, the Exception will not be handled.
remediation: Handle exception caught in catch block.

technicalCriteria.name: Programming Practices - Error and Exception Handling

qualityStandards.name: Empty exception block
qualityStandards.description: Remove instances where an exception handling block (such as catch and finally blocks) of a function, method, procedure, stored procedure, sub-routine, etc. does not contain any instruction
